0.0.2.en: Better error handling for the bus if no settings defined. Added support for multisensors

0.0.3.en: Added support for temperature sensors. Fixed bug when more than one unit available for pairing.

0.0.5.en: Added error check for settings input

0.0.6.en: Better support for multisensors, more robust update of initial status on loading of devices

0.0.7.en: Fixed bug in multisensor. Added framework for future recurring refresh.

0.0.8.en: Updated smart-bus library. Better parsing of broadcasted updates for relays and switches on the bus.

0.0.9.en: Status update for relays and dimmers every minute. Changed icons

0.1.0.en: Added support for the app to have an ID in the HDL smartbus subnet

0.1.1.en: Recurring updates of tempsensors and multisensors.

0.1.2.en: Support for more dimmers and sensors

0.2.1.en: Adding lux support to multisensors if available

0.2.4.en: Adding support for DMX devices as relays
